setting.name: *quickreload
setting.desc: Enable quickreload. This will auto-reloads weapons when switching weapons.

setting.name: *fastmove
setting.desc: Enable fastmove. This allows you to move quickly with slow weapons like (deagle) whilst standing up after crouching.

setting.name: *fastfire
setting.desc: Enable fastfire. This cancelling the full fire animation whilst allowing you to shoot with slow-fire weapons like (deagle) much faster.

setting.name: *crouchbug
setting.desc: Enable crouchbug. This Enable crouch bug, needed to work with the others Glitches.

setting.name: *highcloserangedamage
setting.desc: To disable it use false. Disabling this removes the extremely high close range damage guns inflict when fired at very close range.

setting.name: *fastsprint
setting.desc: To disable it use false. Disabling this removes the ability to sprint faster by repeat key 'space'.

setting.name: *hitanim
setting.desc: To disable it use false. Disabling this removes the impact of being hit with weapons such as deagle, does not include sniper.

setting.name: *ExtraFastFire
setting.desc: This will allowing you to shoot faster with (Sniper and Shotgun). And also will auto reload deagle.

setting.name: *ExtraShotEffects
setting.desc: This will adds new effect when shooting with deagle.
